div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo secundo
die mensis Nouembris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo

The said day Wilyeame portar come Souerte be his handis and gudes
that he sall kep Elizibetht meldrum Johnne arthour and Wilyeame chesame
executouris to vmquhile Johnne portar skathles and free at the handis of the
ayris of vmquhil the said Johnne and al vthir handis clamit entires' tharto of the govne
and doublet vest to master alexander portar Cousing to the said Johnne
insafer as the said govne and doubletis of awaile and' the said master oblist
him to freitht the said Johnne Wilyam of the said Souerte

head.add: Waus Colisone' anent the punding of ane annuell Rent

div.p:
The said day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' ser Johne
Rutherfurd forspekar that Robert Waus has sufficient power procuratoury and
curatory to pund' compel and distrenye ale landis and tennenmentis awand'
annuell Rentis to Robert prat his Sister sone And to ressaue and vptak the
samyn and of thar ressatis acquitance to gif

The said Katherin lorne grantit that scho lad' ane pot in wed' to alexander
findelasone tua yeris sen' syne quhilk pot the said Katherin allegeit alexander
pottar maid' hir

The said day Androw fyf bailye at commandit Wilyeam scrimgeour officiar to
warne the Relict' of vmquhile androw steuinson' befor the prouost and balyeis
one friday thar to heir the witnes oppinnit and producit anent the gudes of
airschip clamit be Robert stevinsone sone and air till vmquhile Androw stevinson'

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
secundo die mensis Decembris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Alexander gothra tuk him to preif one monunday that
nixt cummys that Wilyam maky myllar at the Justice myllis had nocht
mad' him gud seruice at the myln' of the Justice myllis in the grynding'
of his malt

The said day Will maky myllar of the Justice myllis tuk him to preive
on mononday this day viij dais that alexander blinsele was awand' him
ij s' for leding of elding

The said day Mady blinseile deponit the gret bodely aitht the haly
ewangelist tuechit that the kirtill clamit one hir be the alexander
Rochis seruand' was stollin fra hir and iij li' of money of hir avin and
vthir certane geir be thevis al to gidder at anis this within this ij yeris bigan

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
nouembris Anno quo Supra

The saide day the prouost and balyeis assignit friay that next Cumis to patry
chernsid' tile ansuer to the borghe fundin one him for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of x s' and vi d' fra Alexander King

The secund day of December the yer forsaid Thomas meldrum Androw michelson'
Wilyeame king Johnne of grene Johnne wschear Johnne maky Androw Wryct
Thomas Kridy cordonaris was accusit for the bying of hiddys vthirwais thane
the law of the borgh' schawis that is to say the lug and the horne as elik lang And'
for barkin and schapin baitht and for skathing of the tovne in selling of
schone and stuff derrer thane accordis thame to do of law Quhilkis thaj
denyit And thareftir the said actionis was put to the decisioun' of ane assis'
of thir personis vnder writin that is to say Johnne colisoun' Duncan colisone alexander
gray Wilyeame portar Alexander malisone patry Reid' Wilyeame Wormet
mathou branche Wilyeame murray henry Reid' charlis stevinsone Androw
lousone malcome crag Johnne of crag Wilyeame cheishame burges of
the said burgh' / quhilk riplie auisit the greit aitht suorne deliuerit all
in ane woice concordand' that thai culd' nocht acquit the said cordonaris
of the said bying of hiddis vthirwais thane the law leivis langar thain the lug'
and the horne ar elik lang Of barking and schaping atanys And for skat
ting of the tovne' in selling of schone and vthir stuff ffor the quhilkis
ilkane of thame was in thre amerciamentis of the court And till amend as
law wil and forber in tyme tocum And that was gevin for dome

The said day It was statut and ordanit for the commone proffit
and wil of the tovne be the prouost bailyeis and counsaill that all cordonaris
and craftismen of that craft sall sel seyngil solit schone for men
for xiij or xiiij d' the pair at the hiest price double' solit schone for
tua schillingis wemen schone for viij d' seruandis schone viij d'
barnis schone for vj d' iiij d' or iij d' eftir the quantite of the barne
vnder the pane of breking of commone ordinance And' amerciament
of the court to the bailyeis of the brekaris of this statut alsoft as thai
be conuict' tharof vnforgiffin

Decimo die mensis Decembris Anno quingentesimo decimo Johannes colisone Duncanus
colisone alex Willelmus portar Dauid mar Patricius reid' Dauid Theman
Johannes moir Dauid' fynne andreas meldrum Willelmus Abirdour
andreas Stratoun' Johannes colisone Junior Duncanus fif alexander malison'
patricius chernsid' Jurati dicunt

The said day patry chernsid' androw meldrum Dauid fynne and Johnne arthour
war accsuit for the breking of the statut and Act' maid obefor and newlie Ratefeit
that thai raid' nocht one Sanct nicholes day with the Abbot and prior of
bonacord' To detor the towne eftir the auld' laudabile' consuetud' and
Rit of the said burgh' to the plesour of that glorious Sanct Nicholas
and' the towne et cetera Quhilkis personis put thame in Wil of the prouost and
bailyeis ffor the quhilkis ilkane of thame was in amerciament of the towne
court be thar avin toung grant And til amend' as law wil and
forber in tyme tocum And that was gevin for dome

The xij day of the monetht of December the yer' of gode jM vC and tene
yeris It was ordanit and deliuerit be the prouost ballieis and Counsale present
for the tyme that thar' salbe gevin tile our Souerane lordis propine als'
mekile wynis as it emples' his mastir of wyne Sellar' and seruitoris
tak tile his hienes to gidder with ane dusane pundis of scorcheatis
ane dusane of torchis ane dusan of prikatis ij dusane of Spis of wax
to the pament of the quhilkis thai sale borrou alsmekile of the malis
of the toune quhilkis the prouest balyeis and Counsale grantit to pay agan
at the tyme conuenient tharto

head.add: the personis that Raid nocht one Sanct nicholes day to detoir' the toune

div.p:
The saide dayJonhne Andirsone alias lochehillis Dauid lame and
Jonhne quhitcorce be thar avne toung grant for the brekin' of the
act' and Statutis maid' Obefor to rid' one Sanct nicholes day with
the abbat and prior of bonacorde to detoir the toune et cetera for was in Amerciamentis
of the Court and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eisudem
decimoquarto die mensis Decembris Anno quingentesimo decimo

The said day Robert murray was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
Wilyame rolland' forspekar for the trublance of Duncan fif for
the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court and' til amend' as law
wil and forber in tyme tocum And the said Ducnan was maid quyt
of all triblance of the said robert be the said assis'

The said day robert murray was conuict' be the said assys' for tribu
lance of ormond lesly androw naughtie and gilbert prestone
officiaris in the execucioun' of thar office for the quhilkis he was
in amerciament of the court and til amend' as law wil and forber in tyme
tocum

The said day meg hay wif to Robert murra was conuict' be
the said assis' for the tribulance of the said officiaris for the
quhilkis scho was in amerciament of the court and til amend as law
wil and forber in tyme tocum

The said day Alexander nory oblist him be the faith of his body
to pay to charlis stevinsone iij li' scottis money betuix this and the
fest of candilmes for certane frankis pait for him in france to mathow
doublat the said charlis giffand' the said mathou doublatis
acquitance that he is pait of the said frankis for the said alexander

The said day the assis' ordanit that the Actis maid apone alexander
maltman obefor anent' the malt awand' be him to Robert Waus
be put to execucioun and the said robert to pay Dauid fynne
his hous' maile safer as he occupeit

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
decimoseptimo die Decembris Anno quosupra

The said day Wilyeame scrimgeour officiar at command and
charg of the bailyeis commandit and chargit be the tueching of his
wand' of office Dauid andersone to comper befor thame one friday
tat nixt cummys to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be alexander
nory for the Intrometting with four bonettis of the said alexandris et cetera
becaus the said borgh' was denyit and put til ane assis' And
the said assis' culd nocht decerne tharapone becaus the witnes that was
warnit tharto was warnit callit and nocht comperit

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
decimonono die mensis Decembris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo

The sad day Robert hile grantit him borgh' tile Alexander malisone
for xvj schillingis quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme
of law And' ormond' lesly officiar grantit him to releif the said'
Robert of the said Some

The said day all the broustaris within this burgh' contenit in the officiaris billis
except the wif of cristy prat Jonet crovdane the wif of Dauid broys' the wif
of Dauid fynne the wif of richerd Wricht in William scrmgeouris quarter maly Kintor
Elizibeth ranisone the wif of mathou branche the wif of Dauid lame the wif
of thome riddaile Katherin Wrquhar in ormond leslies quarter Nannis
Kintor and the wif of Johnne pipar in Androw naughteis quarter war
conuict' be an suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd forspekar for the
brekyn of common ordinance and selling of viij d' aile that was nocht
worth vj d' And' selling of the aile derrer than it was set be the cunnaris
for the quhilkis ilkan of thame as in amerciament of the court and till amend'
as law wil and forber in tyme tocum

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the prouost and Counsale
present for the tyme that all Baxtaris within this burgh' sall warne the
officiaris of thar quarter quhen' thar bred' is drawin quhilk officiar
sall se the said bred weyit eftir it be drawin or ony tharof be sellit
gif it be gud sufficient stuf and kepand the pas' euiry officiar kepand'
the personis and weyand' the bred' of thame that thai ar assignit to in
the actis maid' obefor And gilbert prestone now chosin officiar
to haue the sted and place of Johnne cuk officiar' befor him And that
nain of the said baxtaris tak vppoun' hand to sell ony bred' or It be
weyit be the officiar vndir the panis contenit in the statut maid afor
that is to say brekin of commone ordinance And gif the bred' beis dravin
one the nycht It sall stand' quhile the morne that it be weyt be the officiar
of tham that bakis the samyn Nocht withstanding the said baxtaris ar conuict'
now of the said poynte / and for brekin of the pas' sen' it was last gevin
to thame And thar vnlawis supercedit be the Requiest of the prouost and consall
of thar gud bering
